text: Venezolana - Rutas Aéreas de Venezuela RAV S.A. or Venezolana de Aviación, is an airline from Venezuela. Venezolana started flying in 2001 as a charter airline. In 2007, Venezolana begin schedule operations with Boeing 737-200s and BAe Jetstreams aircrafts. Since they got rid of their BAe Jetstreams aircrafts in 2010, Venezolana has been known (like any other Venezuelan airlines) to fly it's big plane (737-200s and MD-80s) to smaller airports locally. ==References== Category:Airlines of South America Category:Organizations based in Venezuela
title: Venezolana
